channel.title: Comments on: SQL 2016 Preview has been released!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: I'm not sure about efficiency, I haven't seen any performance tests but I guess the code to create the SCD logic will be simpler. Just insert new rews and update changes, the table will take care of everything. Everything is SCD Type 2 though :)
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure about efficiency, I haven’t seen any performance tests but I guess the code to create the SCD logic will be simpler. Just insert new rews and update changes, the table will take care of everything. Everything is SCD Type 2 though ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Steven Neumersky
item.dc:creator: Steven Neumersky
item.description: Speaking of old school, I wonder if SCD processing will become more efficient with temporal tables.
item.content:encoded: Speaking of old school, I wonder if SCD processing will become more efficient with temporal tables.

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: Osiris, you can find a list here: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms143506(v=sql.130).aspx
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Osiris
item.dc:creator: Osiris
item.description:
Hi, do you know what are the system requirements to install this preview of SQL 2016?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, do you know what are the system requirements to install this preview of SQL 2016?

Thanks!

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: What do you mean with Connect won't let you? I can see SQL Server 2016 CTP listed under the available editions.
item.content:encoded: What do you mean with Connect won’t let you? I can see SQL Server 2016 CTP listed under the available editions.

item.title: By: RichB
item.dc:creator: RichB
item.description: Don't suppose you know how to leave a bug report for it do you? Connect won't let me.
item.content:encoded:
Don’t suppose you know how to leave a bug report for it do you?
Connect won’t let me.
